/usr/bin/g++   -g3 -gdwarf-2    -m64    CMakeFiles/BufferBandwidth.dir/BufferBandwidth.cpp.o CMakeFiles/BufferBandwidth.dir/Host.cpp.o CMakeFiles/BufferBandwidth.dir/Log.cpp.o  -o bin/x86_64/Debug/BufferBandwidth -rdynamic /opt/AMDAPPSDK-3.0/lib/x86_64/libOpenCL.so -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/opt/AMDAPPSDK-3.0/lib/x86_64
